column2: I decided I don't really care for crab.  The seafood salad sandwich here has just about changed my mind.  I
column4: love the crab meat in this salad
column5: which is also brimming with large
column6: fresh shrimp.  The truffle egg salad sandwich is to die for. I can't wait to try the salmon sandwich and the falafel sandwich. I'm in love with the potato leek soup.  Are you getting the picture here?
